article.description: Kareem South had a career-high 25 points as Texas A&M-Corpus Christi topped Incarnate Word 70-61 on Saturday night.
article.headline: South scores 25 to lift Texas A&M-CC past UIW 70-61
article.linkText: South scores 25 to lift Texas A&M-CC past UIW 70-61
article.story: CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas -- Kareem South had a career-high 25 points as Texas A&M-Corpus Christi topped Incarnate Word 70-61 on Saturday night. Jashawn Talton had 13 points for Texas A&M-Corpus Christi (10-13, 5-5 Southland Conference). Elijah Schmidt added 10 points and three blocks. Emmanuel Toney had 10 points for the hosts. Christian Peevy had 22 points for the Cardinals (6-17, 1-9), whose losing streak reached eight games. Charles Brown III added 13 points. Texas A&M-Corpus Christi plays Sam Houston State at home on Wednesday. UIW plays Southeastern Louisiana on the road on Wednesday. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
